text: (he nabee!) ve striyon ke baare mein aapase dharmaadesh poochh rahe hain. aap kah den ki allaah unake baare mein tumhen aadesh deta hai aur ve aadesh bhee hain, jo isase poorv pustak (quraan) mein tumhen, un anaath striyon ke baare mein sunaaye gaye hain, jinake nirdhaarit adhikaar tum nahin dete aur unase vivaah karane kee ruchee rakhate ho tatha un bachchon ke baare mein bhee, jo nirbal hain tatha (ye bhee aadesh deta hai ki) anaathon ke lie nyaay par sthir raho[1] tatha tum jo bhee bhalaee karate ho, allaah use bhalee-bhaanti jaanata hai
